name: divorces_duration_of_marriage_age_classes
title: Divorces by canton, duration of marriage and age class of both of the divorcing partners
title_en: Divorces by canton, duration of marriage and age class of both of the divorcing partners
description: This dataset presents the annual number of divorces by canton, duration of marriage and age class of the spouses, since 1969.
description_en: This dataset presents the annual number of divorces by canton, duration of marriage and age class of the spouses, since 1969.
